Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 53 runs off 28 balls, his second fifty of the tournament. This helped India to make a commanding 181 for eight.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the team's performance. A high standard for the rest of the tournament has been set.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The move from USA to Barbados was seamless, as India crushed Afghanistan by 47 runs in its first Super 8 game.
Others: Jasprit Bumrah took three wickets for seven runs, proving too hot for the Afghans. Arshdeep Singh and Kuldeep Yadav also performed well with the ball.
